title: Christmas Time Is Here
lyrics: Christmas time is here Happiness and cheer Fun for all that children call Their favorite time of year Snowflakes in the air Carols every where Olden times and ancient rhymes Of love and dreams to share Sleigh bells in the air Beauty every where Yuletide by the fireside And joyful memories there Christmas time is here We'll be drawing near Oh, that we could always see Such spirit through the year    Sleigh bells in the air Beauty every where Yuletide by the fireside And joyful memories there Christmas time is here We'll be drawing near Oh, that we could always see Such spirit through the year Such spirit through the year   end on bass
